description: As a User I want to access orders section So I view order details
name: User should be able to view order details

elements.name: On ReservationFunctional : User should be able to view More Information

steps.name: I am logged in to reservations2 'uat'
I click the View button in Search Orders for a previously created order
The "More Information" section displays data consistent with the order created

elements.name: On ReservationFunctional : User should be able to view Contact Details Information

steps.name: I am logged in to reservations2 'uat'
I click the View button in Search Orders for a previously created order
The "Contact Details" section displays data consistent with the order created

elements.name: On ReservationFunctional : User should be able to Redeem Booking

steps.name: I am logged in to reservations2 'uat'
I click the View button in Search Orders for a previously created order
I click the 'Redeem Booking' History on bookings page
I ensure that the 'Redeem Booking' Modal is visible and the 'Redeem OrderID' header is visible

steps.name: I ensure that the Redeem Selected Ticket Button is disabled by default
I check all ticket options checkboxes
I ensure that the Redeem Selected Ticket Button is enabled
I click the Redeem Selected Ticket Button
The modal is closed and i should see Redeemed under the QR Code
